entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: On top of what has already fallen, expect 80 to 120 mm of rain about the ranges, and 30 to 60 mm of rain about the coast. Peak intensities of 25 to 35 mm/h about the ranges, with thunderstorms likely. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: On top of what has already fallen, expect 80 to 120 mm of rain about the main divide, and 50 to 80 mm within 20 km farther east. Thunderstorms likely. Peak rates of 25 to 35 mm/h expected about the divide. Freezing level 3000 metres. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain with thunderstorms likely. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade decreased to Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain and thunderstorms, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade decreased to Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
